embedding.apiKey.label: Embeddings API Key
embedding.apiKey.help: API key for embeddings (OpenAI-compatible). Use ${OPENAI_API_KEY} or a dummy value if your endpoint does not require auth.

embedding.baseUrl.label: Embeddings Base URL
embedding.baseUrl.help: Override the OpenAI API base URL (OpenAI-compatible). Must include /v1 (example: https://...modal.run/v1).

embedding.model.label: Embedding Model
embedding.model.help: Embedding model identifier passed through to the embeddings endpoint.

embedding.dimensions.label: Vector Dimensions
embedding.dimensions.help: Required for non-OpenAI embeddings unless the model is known (example: BAAI/bge-small-en-v1.5 = 384).

rerank.enabled.label: Rerank Recall
rerank.enabled.help: Rerank memory recall results using an external reranking endpoint.

rerank.baseUrl.label: Rerank Base URL
rerank.baseUrl.help: Defaults to embedding.baseUrl when omitted. Must include /v1.

rerank.topN.label: Rerank Top N
rerank.topN.help: How many candidates to return from reranking (defaults to the recall limit).

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture important information from conversations

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories into context
